testsuite.name: bigfight.combat.CombatEachWeaponTest
testsuite.system-out: null stand still, suddenly pocketing out a small weapon judge's pencil stabbing towards the center of the opponent. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 10 (HP 90 remains). null skillfully counter-attacks with his fist. null carefully dodge the counter-attack. null hurl his weapon judge's pencil, pointing towards the head of the opponent. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 10 (HP 90 remains). null dances in the air, twisting his body and dodge the attack. As heard a howl, null swing big weapon demon scythe and step forwards. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 15 (HP 85 remains). null skillfully counter-attacks with his fist. null carefully dodge the counter-attack. null hurl his weapon demon scythe, pointing towards the head of the opponent. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 15 (HP 85 remains). null dances in the air, twisting his body and dodge the attack. As heard a howl, null swing big weapon gas hammer and step forwards. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null skillfully counter-attacks with his fist. null neglect the defence the lose HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null hurl his weapon gas hammer, pointing towards the head of the opponent. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null dances in the air, twisting his body and dodge the attack. As heard a howl, null swing big weapon trident and step forwards. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null skillfully counter-attacks with his fist. null neglect the defence the lose HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null hurl his weapon trident, pointing towards the head of the opponent. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 0 (HP 100 remains). null dances in the air, twisting his body and dodge the attack.
